long_description: Easy to load and unload thanks to its low tray height, the Yakima StickUp 2-Bike Hitch Rack tilts down to allow convenient access to rear of vehicle and folds up when not in use. Frame arms adjust separately to accommodate bikes with different frame styles. Folds down for access to rear of vehicle; folds up when not in use. Wide wheel tray with adjustable strap holds most tires, from monster freeride bikes to the skinniest of road bikes-no adaptors necessary. Fits both 1.25 in. and 2 in. hitches without need of an adapter; designed for Class II hitches and higher.
short_description: Easy to load and unload thanks to its low tray height, the Yakima StickUp 2-Bike Hitch Rack tilts down to allow convenient access to rear of vehicle and folds up when not in use.
